definition: clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]

sentences.english: There, check that the clocks are all synchronized.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，確保所有時鐘均已同步。

sentences.english: Putting food into an empty stomach helps synchronize the body clock.
sentences.chinese: 空腹喫食物幫助人體時鐘準時。

sentences.english: The downgrade clock began to tick.
sentences.chinese: 美國信用降級的時鐘開始發出滴答聲。

sentences.english: Modern clock inspired by the movement of Japanese folding fan.
sentences.chinese: 受日本摺扇的轉動所啓發而製作的時尚時鐘。

sentences.english: I didn't hear the clock strike.
Simulation clock pushing is the key technique in DIS.
sentences.chinese: 仿真時鐘的推進是分佈交互式仿真系統的關鍵技術。

sentences.english: The strikes of the clock woke me up.
sentences.chinese: 時鐘報時的聲音使我醒來。

sentences.english: The clock of the crystal oscillator can be used for clocking the microcontroller.
sentences.chinese: 該晶體振盪器的時鐘可用於微控制器的時鐘。

sentences.english: The clock of the crystal oscillator can be used for clocking the microcontroller.
sentences.chinese: 該晶體振盪器的時鐘可用於微控制器的時鐘。

sentences.english: Conductive Keratoplasty (CK) can turn back the clock on farsightedness, but it cannot stop the clock.
sentences.chinese: CK雖可回撥遠視的時鐘，但它不能使這時鐘停下來。

sentences.english: We waited for the clock to strike.
With so many clocks, which one has the correct time?
sentences.chinese: 這麼多的時鐘，哪一個纔是正確的時間？

sentences.english: Which layer is used for clock routing and why?
sentences.chinese: 時鐘走線一般用那層金屬，爲什麼？

sentences.english: A built-in clock used for a wide variety of program-timing purposes.
sentences.chinese: 一種內部時鐘，廣泛用於多種程序的定時。

sentences.english: Some Chinese made timepieces are also on display.
sentences.chinese: 也陳列着一些中國的老時鐘。

definition: pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
to measure time/to time/to reckon by time
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
to receive/to accept/to take in/to hold
